thoughtText: Everyone knows that pollutante is dangerious to both the born and unborn generation; stop the pretence! when money speaks people are quiet?
Some of the best things is done on paper, really!. Putting it into practice is just a big lie!.
When you don't create things, you become defined by your tastes rather than ability. Your tastes only narrow & exclude people. So create.
I'm not a good at definition; I'm just a goood at observing the society's bad habits.
Walking on technology development and innovation might eventually put and end to human existence, bad experiment!.
The most disastrous thing that you can ever learn is in our society today is the effect of industrial pollutant on birth,Japan,hero shima!.
The most dangerious topic raise to world leaders is global warming .
Delivering good and safe environment for all globally cannot be overemphasized.
If you optimize everything, you will say human generated pollutant is a cancer to our existence.
The most dangerous form of pollutant is air pollutant .
